subject: Re: Internship Inquiry
body:
Dear Pavi,

Thanks for your kind notes. We admire your hustle and persistence; you've done a lot in your young career/life. Congratulations!

Unfortunately, we're not hiring interns for the summer…first year or otherwise on our engineering team. Should we decide to open up a position, I will be sure to reach out. I'd recommend you reach out to Alex Reichenbach, our former colleague at Matic who's doing a startup on Agentic AI… they may be hiring and may have an opening for you.

Good luck. We sincerely wish you the best — keep up with your hustle/persistence and you will go places!

Best Regards,
Mehul
